summary: Outgoing Gourmet Chef with 21 years of experience in FOH and BOH operations, specializing in hospitality etiquette, food preparation, and superior customer service. Proven ability in team building, project management, cross-functional leadership, and a broad range of culinary roles including gourmet, pastry, grill, and line cooking.

experience.title: Food Preparation Workers/GRILL CHEF
experience.description: Food preparation and grill duties; Food & Beverage Service; Gourmet @YOUR SERVICE. On-call 24/7.

experience.title: Pastry Chef
experience.description: Prepare all foods for the line; Cook/Sous Chef; Serve finished meals on the front line; dishwasher, etc.

experience.title: Grill Chef
experience.description: Prepared all line foods and desserts; per customer request.

experience.title: Grill Master
experience.description: Grill all steaks to perfection; per customer orders and special requests.

experience.title: Prep Chef
experience.description: Prep chef; sales vendor; team sales flyers; display menu development/specials.

experience.title: Crew Leader and Kitchen Manager
experience.description: Assisted guests with menu choices; maintained knowledge of current menu; delivered exceptional service; suggested additional items; answered questions.
